it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class FixedVisibilityTargetCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.FixedVisibilityTargetCalculator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TargetCalculator

    public class FixedVisibilityTargetCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
implements TargetCalculator
    This class is a TargetCalculator that finds targets that are (or are not) visible from the starting point

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean visible
      This property states whether the computed targets are the visible ones (true) or non visible ones (false)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FixedVisibilityTargetCalculator(boolean visible)
      This constructor sets the type of visibility that will be considered

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<java.util.List<Damageable>> computeTargets(Block startingPoint, TargetType type)
      This method returns the groups of Damageable that can be targeted by the Attack solely based on whether they can be seen from the starting point

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • visible

        private final boolean visible
        This property states whether the computed targets are the visible ones (true) or non visible ones (false)

    • Constructor Detail

      • FixedVisibilityTargetCalculator

        public FixedVisibilityTargetCalculator(boolean visible)
        This constructor sets the type of visibility that will be considered
        Parameters:
        visible - true if targets are the visible ones, false if targets are the non visible ones

    • Method Detail

      • computeTargets

        public java.util.List<java.util.List<Damageable>> computeTargets(Block startingPoint,
                                                                 TargetType type)
        This method returns the groups of Damageable that can be targeted by the Attack solely based on whether they can be seen from the starting point
        Specified by:
        computeTargets in interface TargetCalculator
        Parameters:
        startingPoint - the Block relative to which the targets should be
        type - the TargetType that should be considered
        Returns:
        a list of the available groups of targets, which will be empty if none are available
